ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] I have a problem installing Velious...can you help ?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... another copy of Gold Edition: Velious. Cause my EQ life is slowin down w/ out it, and thinkin about quittin. ... Yeah you can try that. Or, you can try
ygData.messageBody:
--- In theeverquesttavern@yahoogroups.com, Derek Wesley
<rangerbrat04@y...> wrote:
>
> The CD is in good shape, but i need to try to get my hands on
another copy of Gold Edition: Velious. Cause my EQ life is slowin
down w/ out it, and thinkin about quittin.
>
> ~Me
>


Yeah you can try that. Or, you can try installing the game on another
computer and see if the error comes up. If it doesn't, go ahead and
copy the file you need from there onto a CD or something and then re-
copy over to your main system. I had a problem similar when
installing Wizardry 8. One of the sound.cab files couldn't install on
one of my boxes, so I installed the game on another machine and
bingo, it worked. That means there's a problem with my CD drive (I
never bothered fixing it because it only appeared to effect Wizardry
only and not the other games). It's probably a driver issue.

Yager
